com.softwareag.wx.is.config.central

Class CommandCentralCliCfg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softwareag.wx.is.config.central.CommandCentralCliCfg

  • public class CommandCentralCliCfg
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the central configuration file of the Command Central CLI client that sits in $SAG_HOME/"CommandCentral/client/conf/cc.properties"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String KEY_PASSWORD
      Key for password that is used in "CommandCentral/client/conf/cc.properties"
      static java.lang.String KEY_SERVER
      Key for server URL that is used in "CommandCentral/client/conf/cc.properties"
      static java.lang.String KEY_USERNAME
      Key for username that is used in "CommandCentral/client/conf/cc.properties"
      static java.lang.String RELATIVE_PATH
      Path to Command Central configuration, relative to $SAG_HOME

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandCentralCliCfg()
      Initialize and read contents of CLI config file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get Command Central CLI config file

      Get password as per Command Central CLI config file

      Get server URL as per Command Central CLI config file
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Get username as per Command Central CLI config file

      Force (re-)read of CLI config file
